series.title: Pathfinder Tales
series.description:
Draw your sword and charge forth into a world of adventure with Pathfinder Tales, official novels and serial web fiction that further explore the fascinating world of the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game. Within these pages, the fantastical world of Golarion comes to life as never before, exploding with wild tales of sword and sorcery from the genre's master storytellers.
    
    Pathfinder Tales novels are standalone adventures written by some of fantasy's bestselling authors, all set in the lovingly detailed world of Golarion. Here are the same nations, characters, and monsters that have inspired gamers around the world to new heights of imagination. Now journey through Golarion as you never have before, through the eyes of canny warriors and flippant scoundrels, and see firsthand why the Pathfinder world has twice earned the prestigious ENnie Award for Best Campaign Setting.
    
    Each Pathfinder Tales novel comes in mass-market paperback format, with new volumes released roughly every three months. You can subscribe to the line to have each volume delivered directly to you, ensuring that you always remain on top of the latest developments in the world of Pathfinder. Subscribers receive a free downloadable version of each book they purchase, in both PDF and ePub formats.
series.note: List is currently ordered with novels at the top in the order published, then short fiction in the order serialized.

series.title: Forgotten Realms
series.description:
Forgotten Realms is a Dungeons and Dragons setting that focuses primarily on Faerûn, an ancient land of magic and monsters, of peril and wonder. 
    
    An arcane cataclysm and the merging of two worlds have ravaged the world, realigned its planes, and left nations in ruins. Wizened emperors and upstart kings scheme and fight to secure a place in the world. Horrifying creatures lurk in and around civilized places. Lost treasures lie in darkness, awaiting rediscovery. 
    
    The shadowy wizards of Netheril gather their power in the north. Countless undead muster to the east in the land of Thay. Ancient evil stirs to the south, where monsters rule. Across the sea, to the west, a continent that was once part of another world beckons with elemental glory. The denizens of the planes are restless in the realigned cosmic order. Old dynasties endure, and new ones gaze about with covetous eyes.
series.note:
There are non-fiction reference books and modules for the game this novel series is based on. This series grouping is only for the actual novels.
    
    The Forgotten Realms novel series includes many, many sub-series. 
    
    A new D&D super-series begins in 2011, The Abyssal Plague. This new super-series spans multiple D&D Series and while some of the AP novels may be Forgotten Realms books, most of them won't be. The only AP books that should be tagged as part fo the Forgotten Realms series are those with the FR logo on the cover.
    
    I've begun adding recent releases to the bottom and arranging them by publication date. A lot more adding and rearranging is needed, please help!

series.title: Forgotten Realms
series.description:
Forgotten Realms is a Dungeons and Dragons setting that focuses primarily on Faerûn, an ancient land of magic and monsters, of peril and wonder. 
    
    An arcane cataclysm and the merging of two worlds have ravaged the world, realigned its planes, and left nations in ruins. Wizened emperors and upstart kings scheme and fight to secure a place in the world. Horrifying creatures lurk in and around civilized places. Lost treasures lie in darkness, awaiting rediscovery. 
    
    The shadowy wizards of Netheril gather their power in the north. Countless undead muster to the east in the land of Thay. Ancient evil stirs to the south, where monsters rule. Across the sea, to the west, a continent that was once part of another world beckons with elemental glory. The denizens of the planes are restless in the realigned cosmic order. Old dynasties endure, and new ones gaze about with covetous eyes.
series.note:
There are non-fiction reference books and modules for the game this novel series is based on. This series grouping is only for the actual novels.
    
    The Forgotten Realms novel series includes many, many sub-series. 
    
    A new D&D super-series begins in 2011, The Abyssal Plague. This new super-series spans multiple D&D Series and while some of the AP novels may be Forgotten Realms books, most of them won't be. The only AP books that should be tagged as part fo the Forgotten Realms series are those with the FR logo on the cover.
    
    I've begun adding recent releases to the bottom and arranging them by publication date. A lot more adding and rearranging is needed, please help!

series.title: Pathfinder Tales
series.description:
Draw your sword and charge forth into a world of adventure with Pathfinder Tales, official novels and serial web fiction that further explore the fascinating world of the Pathfinder Roleplaying Game. Within these pages, the fantastical world of Golarion comes to life as never before, exploding with wild tales of sword and sorcery from the genre's master storytellers.
    
    Pathfinder Tales novels are standalone adventures written by some of fantasy's bestselling authors, all set in the lovingly detailed world of Golarion. Here are the same nations, characters, and monsters that have inspired gamers around the world to new heights of imagination. Now journey through Golarion as you never have before, through the eyes of canny warriors and flippant scoundrels, and see firsthand why the Pathfinder world has twice earned the prestigious ENnie Award for Best Campaign Setting.
    
    Each Pathfinder Tales novel comes in mass-market paperback format, with new volumes released roughly every three months. You can subscribe to the line to have each volume delivered directly to you, ensuring that you always remain on top of the latest developments in the world of Pathfinder. Subscribers receive a free downloadable version of each book they purchase, in both PDF and ePub formats.
series.note: List is currently ordered with novels at the top in the order published, then short fiction in the order serialized.

    An arcane cataclysm and the merging of two worlds have ravaged the world, realigned its planes, and left nations in ruins. Wizened emperors and upstart kings scheme and fight to secure a place in the world. Horrifying creatures lurk in and around civilized places. Lost treasures lie in darkness, awaiting rediscovery. 
    
    The shadowy wizards of Netheril gather their power in the north. Countless undead muster to the east in the land of Thay. Ancient evil stirs to the south, where monsters rule. Across the sea, to the west, a continent that was once part of another world beckons with elemental glory. The denizens of the planes are restless in the realigned cosmic order. Old dynasties endure, and new ones gaze about with covetous eyes.
series.note:
There are non-fiction reference books and modules for the game this novel series is based on. This series grouping is only for the actual novels.
    
    The Forgotten Realms novel series includes many, many sub-series. 
    
    A new D&D super-series begins in 2011, The Abyssal Plague. This new super-series spans multiple D&D Series and while some of the AP novels may be Forgotten Realms books, most of them won't be. The only AP books that should be tagged as part fo the Forgotten Realms series are those with the FR logo on the cover.
    
    I've begun adding recent releases to the bottom and arranging them by publication date. A lot more adding and rearranging is needed, please help!
